home.joinUsExploring: Join us in exploring the fascinating world of neuroscience, communicating with colleagues across the globe, and democratizing education.
home.dedicatedToFostering: We are dedicated to fostering collaboration, education, and research in neuroscience among Arabic-speakers.
home.democratizingEducationDescription: We are striving to create a more diverse, equitable, and inclusive scene into the neuroscience education by using grassroots efforts of the Arabic-speaking community across the world.
home.innovateCollaborateAdvanceDescription: We are committed to driving innovation in the field of neuroscience through connecting scientists who are performing cutting-edge research from across the world and providing avenues for networking and collaboration.
home.empowermentStatement: We strive to empower the Arabic-speaking communities with the knowledge and skills to make a positive impact in the field of neuroscience.
home.passionateAboutBrain: Are you passionate about unraveling the mysteries of the brain through computational methods?
home.courseDesigned: Look no further! Our course is designed to equip you with the essential tools needed to dive into the fascinating field of computational neuroscience.
home.dontMissOpportunity: Don't miss this opportunity to expand your knowledge and join a community of passionate learners.
home.empoweringEducationDescription: Gain practical experience through hands-on learning, explore innovative curriculum, and stay ahead with the latest trends and discoveries in neuroscience.
home.communityEngagementDescription: Connect and collaborate with Arab peers and professionals, learn from leading researchers, and acquire essential skills to thrive in the field.
home.certificationRecognitionDescription: Earn industry-recognized certifications that validate your expertise and enhance your career opportunities in the field.
home.continuousSupportDescription: Benefit from 24/7 support via our dedicated Discord server, ensuring ongoing interaction and assistance beyond regular sessions.
home.eegSchool: Decoding Your Mind with BCI Technology
home.readyToDive: Ready to dive into the world of brain data collection and analysis?
home.eventInvitation: Join us for an immersive event where you'll learn to collect EEG data, explore Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCIs), and master state-of-the-art techniques in signal processing and machine learning.

about.title: About
about.empoweringNeuroscientists: Empowering Arab neuroscientists to shape the future of brain science
about.aboutText: We are a community of Arabic speakers passionate about Neuroscience, Cognitive Science, Psychiatry, and NeuroAI, aimed at fostering connections, collaboration, and contributions among aspiring Arab neuroscientists. Our goal is to engage Arabic-speaking neuroscientists through hands-on experiences, kick-starting their careers and driving meaningful advancements in the field.
about.organizationDescription: Arabs in Neuroscience is an incorporated not-for-profit organization under the Canada Not-for-profit Corporations Act.
about.abrirDescription:
ABRIR (Advancing Big-team Reproducible Science through Increased Representation) began as an initiative to identify the unique challenges faced by social science researchers (psychologists particularly) from developing countries. Today it is a Consortium of psychological scientists from developing countries. 

ABRIR's mission is to borrow from our community of diverse researchers to identify struggles and devise solutions collaboratively to conduct open and reproducible psychological science. In this endeavor, we are grateful to our brilliant collaborators who have been helping us achieve this mission. 

ABRIR and Arabs in Neuroscience are working towards reducing barriers to neuroscience research and teaching in developing countries.

contact.embarkJourney: Embark on a journey through the intricacies of the mind with us.
contact.virtualDoorsOpen: Whether you have questions, seek guidance, or simply want to delve deeper into the fascinating world of neuroscience tutorials, our virtual doors are always open.
contact.reachOut: Reach out to us! We're here to assist you with any inquiries you may have.

opportunities.title: Opportunities
opportunities.makeNeuronDifference: Pioneer a distinctive path in neurosciences

faq.beyondAnswers: Beyond answers, FAQs are solutions delicately woven in the fabric of simplicity.

school.summerSchoolContent: AiN summer school equips you with the essential tools and knowledge to explore the brain through the lens of computers and algorithms. Whether you're a neuroscience enthusiast or a programming wizard, this program empowers you to understand the mind's complex workings through the power of code.
school.journeyDescription: AiN summer school is about igniting your passion, building a vibrant community of like-minded individuals, and empowering you to become a pioneer in the field of computational neuroscience.
school.closedApplications2023: Applications for the 2023 summer school have closed.
school.leadGuideResearch: Lead students group and assist them with the tutorials and the final project.
school.facilitateLearning: Facilitate problem-based learning, offer expertise, and support collaborative learning.
school.fullTimeTemporary: Full-time, temporary, contracted role with payment.
school.certificateLetter: Receive a certificate and may request a recommendation letter.
school.fullTimeAttendance: Full-time attendance required with no more than two absences.
school.placedInGroups: Placed in groups applicationDeadline about 10 with a teaching assistant.
school.participateDiscussions: Expected to participate in discussions, tutorials, and the final project.
school.receiveCertificate: Receive a certificate upon completion, including a collaborative team project presentation.

description.compNeuroscienceRealm: Imagine decoding the language of neurons, predicting behavior patterns, or even developing brain-computer interfaces; this is the realm of computational neuroscience.
description.compToolsUnlockMindMysteries: It's not just about cool brain facts; it's about applying computational tools to unlock the mysteries of the mind, holding the potential to revolutionize fields like healthcare, education, and artificial intelligence.
description.comprehensiveCurriculum: Our instructors, who are experts in their respective fields, will guide you through a comprehensive curriculum covering programming with Python, linear algebra, calculus, statistics, and basic neuroscience principles.
description.courseForEveryone: Whether you're a beginner or looking to deepen your understanding, our course offers something for everyone.
description.engageWithMaterials: Engage with our course materials, including tutorials, videos, and slides, carefully curated to enhance your learning journey.
description.blendOfLecturesAndQAs: With a blend of pre-recorded lectures and live Q&A sessions, you'll have ample opportunities to clarify doubts and interact with instructors.
description.threeWeekJourney: Embark on a three-week journey packed with enriching content, practical sessions, and exciting projects.
description.masteringPython: From mastering Python fundamentals to exploring advanced topics in calculus and statistics, each week offers a unique learning experience.
description.vibrantLearningEnvironment: We welcome Arabic-speaking participants from every corner of the globe, fostering a vibrant and inclusive learning environment.
description.connectAndForgeConnections: Connect with like-minded individuals, exchange ideas, and forge lifelong connections with peers and mentors.
description.dedicatedEffort: The course requires a dedicated effort for three weeks, with participants expected to devote 4-6 hours per day, Monday to Friday.
description.structuredGroups: Participants will be organized into small groups, consisting of 10 students each, along with a teaching assistant. This structure facilitates collaborative learning and personalized support throughout the course.
description.structuredDailyRoutine: Each day, students will follow a structured schedule, which includes:
description.watchLectures: Watching prerecorded video lectures covering essential topics.
description.liveCodingSessions: Participating in live coding sessions with their pod to reinforce learning and practical application.
description.interactiveQAs: Engaging in interactive Q&A sessions with instructors to clarify doubts and deepen understanding.
description.liveSessions: Live sessions will be conducted, providing an interactive platform for real-time engagement with instructors and peers.
description.codingSessions: Coding sessions will utilize Google Colab, offering a collaborative environment for coding in Python and accessing course materials.
description.communicationPlatform: Participants will join AiN Discord community, facilitating collaboration and support outside of scheduled sessions.
description.lecturesHosted: Prerecorded video lectures will be hosted on YouTube, providing convenient access to course content.
description.dailyActivities: A detailed schedule outlining daily activities and assignments will be provided in the Course Details page, ensuring clarity and organization throughout the learning journey.
description.applyThroughLink: Apply through the provided form link and await an acceptance email with setup instructions.
description.dontMissOut: Don't miss out on this chance to embark on a transformative learning journey!

footer.shapingFutureNeuroscience: Shaping the future of Neuroscience in the Arab world!

isnSchool.introIsnSchool: Decoding Your Mind with BCI Technology
isnSchool.summerSchoolOverview: This Summer School is designed to empower Arabic-speaking students and scientists with the knowledge and skills necessary to explore the brain's electrical activity through cutting-edge neurotechnology. This program offers a comprehensive introduction to Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCIs) and electroencephalogram (EEG) data collection and analysis including an in-school project, with Arabic as the main spoken language. It will also serve as a hub to network students and faculty interested in neuroscience.
isnSchool.educationDescription: Lectures and workshops by faculty members on the different techniques of data collection and analysis as well as the applications in neurotechnology and neuroscience.
isnSchool.handsOnDescription: Students will conduct hands-on tutorials on EEG data collection and analysis covering all the stages of project ideation, experimental design, data collection and analysis, and making conclusions.
isnSchool.projectOpportunity: Students will get the opportunity to apply what they learned in a short project which could utilize data collected onsite or already provided datasets. They will be working on their projects in the afternoon and will present them on the last day.
isnSchool.networkingDescription: The social cohesion component will be focused on where the students will be having lunches together with the faculty and teaching assistants, which will give them the opportunity to socialize informally with the faculty members.
isnSchool.day1Title: Introduction to Neurotechnology and Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCIs)
isnSchool.day1Desc: Overview of neurotechnology and brain-computer interfaces (BCIs), including history, key concepts, major applications, neural data principles, and current and emerging uses. Speakers will also discuss their research contributions.
isnSchool.day2Title: Principles of Electrophysiology and EEG-Based BCIs
isnSchool.day2Desc: Exploration of EEG-based brain-computer interfaces (BCIs), focusing on experimental protocols and data acquisition. Learn about EEG technology fundamentals, setting up experiments, best practices, and expert insights from EEG BCI research.
isnSchool.day3Title: EEG Signal Processing Techniques and Feature Extraction
isnSchool.day3Desc: Techniques for processing EEG signals and extracting features, including preprocessing, feature extraction methods, and their application in BCI systems. Examples from research work will be provided.
isnSchool.day4Title: Machine Learning for EEG in BCIs and Healthcare
isnSchool.day4Desc: Application of machine learning to EEG data for brain-computer interfaces (BCIs) and healthcare. Topics include machine learning basics, EEG classification algorithms, real-world applications, and case studies from research.
isnSchool.day5Title: Future Directions in Neurotechnology: Advancements and Ethical Considerations
isnSchool.day5Desc: Discussion on future advancements in neurotechnology and brain-computer interfaces (BCIs), including potential applications, innovations, and ethical considerations in research and application.
isnSchool.speaker: Speaker
